short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes 9GAG's background to black to make it easier on your eyes.

Unofficial Chrome Extension to help you turn off the lights on 9GAG and relieve the strain on your eyes.
